p.k: Lambs to the slaughter, or maybe not
p.d: Twins and both artists at heart, the two candidates Johann and Stéphane put their fusional bond aside, to pit themselves one against the other in the kitchen. Jokes galore there may be, but neither will be giving any quarter when it comes to their fillet of lamb and quinoa-yoghurt-avocado salad. Presented by: Bénédicte Deprez, Florian Barbarot.
